translations.text: Indeed, on that Day the residents of Paradise will be busy enjoying themselves.
Indeed, today the fellows of the Garden(of Paradise) are happily busy,
Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -

The people of Paradise on this day, which is the day of resurrection, will be preoccupied from thinking about others, because of the permanent bliss and supreme success they will see. They will be enjoying that happily.
The people of the Paradise are engaged today in (their) activities, happily enjoying (them).
